thread.section_title: Reuters: Financial Services and Real Estate
thread.title: China's SenseTime raises $620 mln in latest funding round

title: China's SenseTime raises $620 mln in latest funding round
text:
HONG KONG, May 31 (Reuters) - Chinese facial recognition technology developer SenseTime Group Ltd has raised $620 million in its latest round of funding, valing the company at more than $4.5 billion.
The financing was led by Fidelity International, Hopu Capital, Silver Lake and Tiger Global, it said in a statement.
Reporting By Sijia Jiang; Editing by Anne Marie Roantree and Edwina Gibbs
